attributes.action: Approve permission for a cashpoint in Carleton, just outside Poulton-le-Fylde, Lancashire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The area is mainly elderly and many have to travel into neighbouring Poulton-le-Fylde for a cashpoint.  This results in a number of shops in Carleton losing potential business and thus we ask the Prime Minister to pressure banks to establish a cashpoint in Carleton both for convenience and for the benefit of local enterprises.
